DOC.brief_summary: This study examine effect supplemental ElevATP without blend extended-release caffeine B vitamins change body composition , athletic performance , hematology 12 week intervention period .
DOC.brief_title: Effects ElevATP Body Composition Athletic Performance
DOC.detailed_description: In double-blind , placebo , diet , train control design , 57 subject participate eight week , resistance high intensity interval training study ass ergogenic potential elevATP without caffeine plus vitamin comparison visually identical , equal volume placebo within periodized training program ( describe ) . Prior test training , subject report laboratory screen familiarization test protocol . The following week , subject complete baseline test measurement include 3 day food log . During next eight week , subject participate periodized resistance train program alters repetition load scheme daily weekly . During entirety training protocol , subject supplement daily either 1 serve elevATP , 1 serve Dropz ( elevATP + caffeine ) , 1 serve equal volume , visually identical placebo . Measurements repeat end week 4 8 , 10 , 12 . Variables collect : - Dual Emissions X-Ray Absorptiometry ( DEXA ) determine ( week 0 , 4 , 8 , 10 , 12 ) : - Body fat - Lean body mass - Body fat percentage - Bioelectric Impedance Analysis Spectroscopy ( BIA/BIS ) determine ( week 0 , 4 , 8 , 10 , 12 ) : - Body fat - Lean body mass - Body fat percentage - Ultrasonography determine cross-sectional area ( week 0 , 4 , 8 , 10 , 12 ) - 1-repetition maximum ( 1RM ) strength squat ( week 0 , 4 , 8 , 10 , 12 ) - 1RM strength bench press ( week 0 , 4 , 8 , 10 , 12 ) - 1RM strength deadlift ( week 0 , 4 , 8 , 10 , 12 ) - Vertical jump height power ( week 0 , 4 , 8 , 10 , 12 ) - Bench press power ( week 0 , 4 , 8 , 10 , 12 ) - Anaerobic peak average power output ( week 0 , 4 , 8 , 10 , 12 ) - Blood count , metabolic , lipid safety panel ( week 0 , 8 , 12 ) - Anthropometrics ( week 0 , 4 , 8 , 10 , 12 ) - Vital Signs ( week 0 , 4 , 8 , 10 , 12 ) - Myokines biomarkers regeneration panel ( week 0 , 4 , 8 , 12 ) : Analysis perform VDF FutureCeuticals , Inc. MusclePharm ship frozen serum sample ( 1-2ml ) subject VDF FutureCeuticals , care Zbigniew Pietrzkowski , 16259 Laguna Canyon Rd , Irvine , CA 92618 Resistance training protocol Will consist daily undulating periodization design high volume , high velocity , high intensity workout . Exercises perform back squat , bench press , deadlift , leg press , bent row , shoulder press , pulldown , dip , bicep curl , tricep extension , single-arm row , hammer strength chest press , lateral raise , incline bench press , power squat , leg extension , leg curl . Exercises perform 1-15 repetition , 3-5 set , 0.5-5 minute rest set . Diet Each subject receive personalize diet suit individual need . Total calorie calculate base Mifflin St. Jeor equation . One half total calorie derive carbohydrate , fat proteins equally compose remain one half total calorie .
DOC.criteria: Age 1835 year Healthy assess Preexercise Testing Health Status General Information Questionnaire Strength train minimum 3 year assess preexercise test questionnaire Minimum strength requirement 1x bodyweight bench press 1.5x bodyweight squat deadlift . Subject provide write date informed consent participate study Having history medical event may significantly affect study outcome , include cardiovascular disease , metabolic , renal , hepatic , musculoskeletal disorder Use medicine may significantly affect study outcome Use ergogenic aid one month prior onset study
